title: Identify the Purpose
text: Consider what type of diagram is used to show relationships and hierarchy within an organization.

title: Focus on Structure
text: Think about which diagram is specifically designed to represent the structure of an organization.

title: Consider the Options
text: Eliminate diagrams that are not typically used for showing hierarchical relationships.

title: Recognize Common Diagrams
text: An organizational chart is commonly used to display the hierarchy of an organization.
